description: For young skiers with personality. The Komperdell Really Pink poles let young rippers ride along beside you, or venture off on their own. Sized for small hands, the grips and straps stay securely in place for the next turn. With light but strong construction, these poles are ready to rip all day.14mm diameter in 5083 aluminum.Durable polyurethane race grips with an adjustable system strap.Race baskets allow snag free turns.Steel tips handle ice and compact snow.
name: Komperdell Really Pink Ski Poles
